main event: A factory worker in Bad Hersfeld, Germany photographed a dome-topped saucer with landing gears above the factory where he worked on August 8, 1954.
interesting points: The object is described as a 'dome-topped saucer with landing gears' above the factory.
The object is shown as a 'high, dark spinning Unidentified Flying Object' in the photograph.
The photograph was enlarged 30 times to show more detail of the object.
The time of the sighting was in the early morning of August 8, 1954.
The photographer is unknown, but the image was provided by Albert Steiner.
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph of the object
